name: Ravelry Dark Mode
description:
A dark mode for ravelry.com, with the text changed for readability.

Mostly meant as a temporary solution until Ravelry releases their own dark mode.
additional_info:
This style is based off of Evanita Montalvo's Ravelry - Return to Subtle Greens (https://userstyles.org/styles/185312/ravelry-return-to-subtle-greens).

Updates:

June 18, 2020:
-Changed the "my notebook" section to display a blue color instead of teal when hovering over a link.
-Fixed a few links (including the agree/disagree/etc. buttons) to display as light gray when they've been clicked.
-Removed a few stray drop shadows from pattern pages.
-Changed all borders to black.
